org.xchain.framework.lifecycle

Class ClassScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.scanner.AbstractScanner
      • org.xchain.framework.lifecycle.ClassScanner

  • public class ClassScanner
extends AbstractScanner
    A scanner that searches the lifecycle context looking for commands and catalogs, creates engineered versions of those classes, and loads them into the context.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble, Mike Moulton, Devon Tackett, John Trimble, Josh Kennedy
